subject: Hockey, Ice
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Hired in November to replace Bruce Boudreau, Dale Hunter led the Capitals to the second round of the N.H.L. playoffs with a defense-first, possession-oriented system.
snippet: Hired in November to replace Bruce Boudreau, Dale Hunter led the Capitals to the second round of the N.H.L. playoffs with a defense-first, possession-oriented system.
